name: nnnfi

body.origin:
|- wn(wcel(cn, cfn))
-| wcel(nat1, cz)
-| wi(wcel(nat1, cz), wn(wcel(cn, cfn)))
body.pretty:
⊢ ¬ ℕ ∈ Fin
⊣ 1 ∈ ℤ
⊣ (1 ∈ ℤ → ¬ ℕ ∈ Fin)

cumulated.origin:
|- wn(wcel(cn, cfn))
-| wcel(nat1, cz)
-| wi(wcel(nat1, cz), wn(wcel(cn, cfn)))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ ¬ ℕ ∈ Fin
⊣ 1 ∈ ℤ
⊣ (1 ∈ ℤ → ¬ ℕ ∈ Fin)

cumulated.origin:
|- wn(wcel(cn, cfn))
-| wi(wcel(nat1, cz), wn(wcel(cn, cfn)))

body.origin:
|- wi(wcel(nat1, cz), wn(wcel(cn, cfn)))
-| wceq(cn, cfv(cuz, nat1))

comment: The set of positive integers is infinite. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 11-Oct-2020.)
